triples.name: Question answering
triples.relevance: The paper presents a dataset for question answering, a core NLP task that involves answering questions about text.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: The paper focuses on developing multilingual NLP models and datasets for language understanding.

triples.name: Linguistic typology
triples.relevance: The paper introduces a novel approach to dataset construction based on typological diversity of languages.

triples.name: Information retrieval
triples.relevance: The paper focuses on information-seeking QA, which involves retrieving relevant answers to user queries.

triples.name: Dataset (machine learning)
triples.relevance: The paper proposes TyDi QA, a new benchmark dataset with 204K question-answer pairs across 11 languages.

triples.name: Multilingualism
triples.relevance: The paper focuses on multilingual modeling and evaluation across typologically diverse languages.
